question: Howdy ya all!I just took shot 4 of a 48 week deal of Peg/riba.  I have stage 4 portal cirrhosis.  Hep C, type 1b.Last week I developed this really itchy rash on both inside lower arms.  Is it something to be concerned about, or just another side?Also, I just read in the forum about this diabetes deal.  I never heard that before, but maybe I should be concerned since I was a 30 year practicing alcoholic, now with hep c and cirrhosis. You know, sometimes this all feels pretty hopeless.  My nurse said that my case is serious.  I asked her how serious, should I visit my kids?  She said yes, definitely.  The doctor says 2 days to 5 years to live without a liver transplant.  What am I supposed to make of that?  Thank God for His Son and eternity!  God bless you all! Hope you have a wonderful Jesus birthday!Ron
title: Rash?
